website_summaries.verdict: A portable powerhouse with a compact design and a water resistant construction. Ideal for camping and other outdoor activities.
pros: Lithium battery delivers up to 60 minutes of continuous use
Recharges in around 3 hours via USB
An IPX4 water resistance rating means this pump will keep on working through rain or water splashes
cons: Feels a little flimsy, but seems to hold up just fine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for vacuuming sealing clothing for a vacation
customer_reviews.text: We used this for packing our clothing for vacation. It was ideal and easily packable so that coming home wasn't a problem. Be careful of the bags u select. We needed 2 different attachments for 2 different styles of bags. The honey can do brand worked the best. Battery life was far more than I expected. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as useful as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.text: This unit simply cannot inflate anything up to pressure. It appears to max out around 2 psi, which is no where near fully inflated for my air mattress. The water resistant cover on the charging port barely allows enough clearance to plug in and charge the unit. I expect that it will get torn off after only a handful of charges. It doesn't seem to seal the charging port very well either. Battery holds up without issue so far. Very lightweight and compact. 3 stars for ease of use because the accessories don't attach very securely, but that is manageable.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Light and powerful
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little pump. Used it to inflate our floaties and everyone else’s on a hike to a high mountain lake
customer_reviews.author: 3r1c

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I use it to deflate my travel bags and it works like a charm. I love how compact the device is and appreciate being able to recharge as well as use varying attachments. In fact, on a recent beach trip, I carried it to the beach and blew up my floats. It’s so light and small in size that it easily fit in my pool bag. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Isn't this the niftiest little thing?
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today and I have already deflated two vacuum bags and couldn't be happier with the way it works. I love the idea that I can charge it with a USB cable (included) and take it with me wherever I go. I plan to inflate my inflatable kayak this weekend. It appears to be well-made, includes the needed tips, and all goes in a drawstring bag. Pretty handy dandy and this purchaser is happy.
customer_reviews.author: ILoveAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have for camping
customer_reviews.text: Works as stated, able to blow up 2 queen sized mattresses and power left over!
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of power in a small package!
customer_reviews.text: We used it on our camping trip last weekend a s it worked great. We blew up our thick queen mattress a couple of times and it had plenty of juice to get the job done. The only thing I'd like was a couple more tips in the bag. The flexible one got the job done, but you have to hold the pump on the air inlet the entire time. Minor complaint though. I'm generally really happy with this tiny pump. It is much better than my old rechargeable coleman mattress pump. Modern technology winds again!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan - Avid Handyman

customer_reviews.title: Great for taking to go
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for taking with me and put air in pool inflatables, since they do not fit in my trunk already inflated. It works great for that. It does take a bit of time to inflate but it works. It also deflates easy. The only thing I do not like is that any of the attachments included seem to work for certain inflatables. The long attachment is the only one that has been useful for my purposes. It charges easy with a usb cable and a portable power bank.
customer_reviews.author: Isa Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Low pressure output
customer_reviews.text: Tested on a 65cm stability ball: Inflated the ball from flat to 50cm in about 5 minutes then to 53cm by the 7 minute mark. Barely any progress after. So the ball is still under sized and mushy. I'm assuming the pressure inside the ball was greater than this inflators output. Maybe best for other uses but couldn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Skeered1

customer_reviews.title: I used this thing for exactly what it isn't intended to do. . . It held up like a champ
customer_reviews.text: Well my wife and I got two inflatable paddle boards. This thing was NOT designed to inflate a paddleboard, or a boat, but that doesn't mean it can't. Spill some water on your aunt's antique wooden chair and need to dry it out? This thing has you covered. Need to clear a few leaves off your apartment balcony? It does the job. Need to save your back inflating (or deflating) your paddle board? This will get you 90% of the way there. Want to scare your spouse at some ungodly hour of the night? I'm sure it would work well there too. It's not the quietest pump, but not too loud either. He's a solid little guy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Small and Light. Charged it fully over night and it inflated 6 large inflatable pool rafts/floats. I also got this to take camping to inflate an air mattress. Prior to this great little infiltrator I had a much larger and heavier on that used 4 D Cells. This one is great because I don't have to worry about needing to replace batteries. I like the on-off button. it is flush, so you not have to worry about it kicking on by accident when packed in a bag. I also has charge indicator to let you know when it's fully charged. Price was right, too.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Aweaome. Must have camp gear
customer_reviews.text: Update. They honored the warranty and I got my replacement. I love this thing and how handy it is for inflatables or stoking a fire with some fresh oxygen if burning smokey. Old review: Took it out of the camp box after 6 months. Dead, even after charging and even after connecting to a battery pack unable to start. I think it is done.... they say 12 month warranty but I am 2 months before the end. Let's see if they honor it.
customer_reviews.author: mtb_ninja

customer_reviews.title: It's a good item.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good item to have, especially for a quick air on little things.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Cease

customer_reviews.title: Good for camping
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because we were going camping up river by boat. I have a queen air mattress and after reading the reviews I was worried it would not fully blow it up. It had plenty a battery life left and works well. I do wish the attachments were better because they kept coming off and that was frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Saralovesamazonprime

customer_reviews.title: Will inflate a Static V Luxe sleeping pad
customer_reviews.text: Being careful to keep the inflation port un-obstructed it took two minutes to mostly inflate my Klymit insulated Static V Lux sleeping pad. It took two good breaths to firm it up since the Max Pump Plus, as stated on the package, only puts out 0.27 PSI. I am satisfied because otherwise it takes at least 30 large breaths to inflate and it will minimize moisture getting into the pad.
customer_reviews.author: H. Lundberg

customer_reviews.title: A Cheap 3D Printed Chinese Box
customer_reviews.text: There are more bad things about this than good. This is a 3D printed (and cheap at that) chinese box. The inflation tube is at a weird angle and it's hard to use for most applications. The included attachments don't fit in standard air mattress intakes. It's also not powerful enough for air mattresses. After a mild inflation it just chokes and won't continue inflating. The Pros, it's small and the power is surprinsingly long lasting given this cheap product. Overall this is too expensive for its cheap quality. DONT BUY! unless you're planning to only inflate balloons.
customer_reviews.author: C. Arteaga

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kayak camping
customer_reviews.text: Used the pump on a 5 day kayak camping trip. The size was perfect for packing on my kayak. Everyone used it to blow up their mattresses and it still had a charge at the end of the trip. Will be buying this as gifts for my camping friends!
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: easy to charge and it works great
customer_reviews.text: It's so portable, easy to charge and it works great! We took it to the lakehouse and used it to inflate all of the water toys. Fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Nice! Does what it is advertised to do, you do have to use your mouth to finish the item out and make it tightly full of air, but the bulk of the item is aired up by this tiny air compressor!! Works fast and not too loud! Battery also seems to have a decent run time on a full charge.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Ok.. but.
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept of this little thing but didnt really help unless you are blowing up something super small. It was pretty noisy. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Mind blown!
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with this air pump!! It blew up two 16" twin sized air mattresses in less than 10 minutes and still had plenty of charge left! My mind is blown! I wasn't going to order it because of the bad reviews but decided the good outweighed the bad and I am so glad I did! It's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Welsh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: EX-CEL-LENT... Excellent product!!! So lightweight, it’s unbelievable how gReat it works. Durable material & inflates in SECONDS (even fairly large items, like mattresses & sofa chairs)...!!!!! I’m purchasing another. SO HAPPY I have this.
customer_reviews.author: Rosh

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write product reviews, but I have been so pleased with the Max Pump Plus I felt the need to tell prospective purchasers. I use the pump primarily for mattress inflation/deflation on camping trips. This little pump is truly amazing. Inflates a 4 inch sleeping pad in minutes. Then just as effective at pulling the air out. Weighs nothing so no problem for backpacking or car camping. Recharges quickly with USB connection. Not nearly as noisy as larger air compressors. I wish I could give more than 5 stars. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Eurotripper

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it a couple of times but it fills and deflates a queen sized full thickness air mattress with ease - much faster than the big heavy hand pump that came with mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Suthern

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little product.
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat lightweight. Inflated my air core ultra 20x72 in less that 30 seconds, made my life alot easier I don't have to blow up my air Mattress with my breath after a long hike. Inexpensive and good quality, I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Moses

customer_reviews.title: Surprised & Impressed
customer_reviews.text: This little pump is awesome. Took it on a family beach trip & it was Abigails hit with everyone. It is powerful & charge last quite a while. I would definitely recoomed & would reorder again. Shipping was very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Mighty Mini
customer_reviews.text: Small with lots of Power. I was surprised on how much power this pump has. Inflated two queen mattresses and two twins with extra power for the remaining 2 days of the camping trip. I really liked the ability to use the pump to deflate the mattresses
customer_reviews.author: Kcabtri

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This thing has been amazing . It can do exactly what it says . I blew up two double person tubes and one large raft with no problems . Deflated all nice and tight also with no problems . About 15 minutes to inflate . I also inflated them all again once I got home to clean them and deflated all in the same charge and it still have more . Used it 3 times now and the small compact and waterproof pet means I can take it with me on the river . This thing kicks ass
customer_reviews.author: jorge correia

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: This is a godsend. I love the option to inflate or deflate. Use it all the time on the river! Do yourself a favor and purchase you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Crossed

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for the first time and the product came broken so I exchanged it.. and got a second one and I put it on the charge and charger wasn’t working.. it came defective twice.. so it looks like it is poorly made.. I am returning it.. sadly
customer_reviews.author: lhundup tsomo

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it.  It beats dragging out the air compressor.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I've used it to fill 3 large kiddie pools so far. Only charged it once when I received it. I can't speak of the durability of the unit, but it does its job and it does it relatively quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Z

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: Have only used it a handful of times, but it works great. It makes taking floats on the boat much easier because we can deflate them. Battery lasts. You just need to have a brick for the USB to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: FLEXTAILGEAR - MAX Pump Plus
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best and smallest pump out there.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Concerned about charging port
customer_reviews.text: Just received and looking to charge it for an upcoming trip...Both included cable and others I had have trouble staying in the charging port. Had to tear of small port cover as it was pushing the cable out of the port. Like the potential of small light inflator, but as charging is looking unreliable and likely point of future failure, will not be keeping.
customer_reviews.author: J Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Compact and Vibrant
customer_reviews.text: Blew up my inflatable with EASE!!! Pro tip: you have to REALLY push the pool toy nozzle attachment, but that is something you would have to do with any such nozzle (it just took me few minutes and couple of YouTube videos to figure that out!). Love the color and the rechargability! And of course, it saves me SO much time inflating and deflating floats!
customer_reviews.author: Jason L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and works well to inflate small pool floats. Only used this a few times but so far really like it. The only con is that it's really loud when in use. It took about 5 minutes to fill up my adult sized donut inner tube float. The battery life so far is good.
customer_reviews.author: Naevon

customer_reviews.title: Takes forever but will save your lungs
customer_reviews.text: Probably one hour to inflate one of the big floaties.
customer_reviews.author: Janele

customer_reviews.title: Flextailgear
customer_reviews.text: Very intuitive and nice. Takes a while to fill up air mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Wannomae

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and works.
customer_reviews.text: Used backpacking. Great lightweight pump. Easy to pack and use.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Kayaker approved.
customer_reviews.text: Inflates a SUP, Inflatable Kayak or bed mattress in minutes. Love!
customer_reviews.author: River

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for a short while, but then stopped within 2 months of use
customer_reviews.text: The pump worked well for a short period, but then stopped working all of a sudden. Initially, the pump would not turn off (kept running even after pressing the power button) and then would not charge. For this price, I will go with another inexpensive pump.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: A camping must have
customer_reviews.text: Small, effective and easy to use hand help pump. Used to inflate camping air mattresses and was not disappointed. Inflated our twin sized mattresses multiple times, quickly and without fail over a week long trip on one charge. Easy to use and really lightweight!
customer_reviews.author: Mara

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: The product broke after three weeks. We had to buy Another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Cardozo

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is beyond amazing. I used to leave all my floats full due to the hassle but now this inflates in no time and so easy to carry. It’s a must buy
customer_reviews.author: herman

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work for SUP
customer_reviews.text: Nozzles do not fit in the SUP board blow hole
customer_reviews.author: Shame on paid reviews

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Best cordless, rechargeable pump! We use it on beach and for our air mattresses. We can blow them up and also use the pump in reverse to deflate them. Holds charge for multiples uses and charges quickly. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: M New

customer_reviews.title: I was let down.
customer_reviews.text: Very small and convenient but doesn’t have a lot of power. It’s loud and it blows out pretty soft. I read all the reviews and thought it would be better but I was not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: great for packrafts
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little pump with great battery life. My wife and I own two Alpacka Packrafts and this inflates each 8 foot boat in under a minute. This is exactly the same as the Kokopelli Feather Pump which they sell for over $40. Great pump for packrafts!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Ordered new shipped damaged
customer_reviews.text: The product seemed to be refurbished when I ordered a new one. The case seems it has been through some tough weather and the charging cable has marks all over it as if it was dragged on asphalt. Not sure if the product works but I’m hoping it does
customer_reviews.author: nathan

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing!!!! It’s great for pool floats!!! Works perfectly, it isn’t heavy and doesn’t make too much noise either.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Powerful for its size
customer_reviews.text: Used multiple time on a camping trip on one charge. Fills a twin size air matteress in 3-4 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: kevin pruett

customer_reviews.title: Slow and noisy
customer_reviews.text: Cute and small. Not powerful and SLow and noisy. Will be returning it. Was hopi g it was stronger and faster. Wanted to use for a small Inflatable boat
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN FISHER

customer_reviews.title: mini air pump
customer_reviews.text: This little pump is awesome... I pumped up a kayak and an air bed and still had plenty of power, what an amazing air pump!
customer_reviews.author: Ray S.

customer_reviews.title: worked or 2 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Just stopped working after 2 minutes of trying to inflate a camp mattress. Fully charged, it just died. ....garbage.

customer_reviews.title: amazing pump
customer_reviews.text: this is a great pump for the price. it is super light wieght and pumps up and deflates your mattress quickly.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I use it to blow up an inflatable pool and matresses. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong. Secure. Light weight
customer_reviews.text: It is a perfect size for me to bring along on backpacking trips?
customer_reviews.author: Esther99

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for backpacking
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Perfect for backpacking. I used it six days in a row to blow up my air mattress without needing to recharge.
customer_reviews.author: Mitzy Noisette

customer_reviews.title: Charger
customer_reviews.text: Item worked for pumping great but charger port must be defective becuase no light comes on and no charge seems to happen
customer_reviews.author: Log

customer_reviews.title: Makes life easy
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. It does the job! I use it for my daughters three ring pool. Works in less than 5 minutes
customer_reviews.author: chrisy

customer_reviews.title: Stops working after 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: Product is as described, but stops working after 2 months of purchased.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: This is the absolute best!!!! PERIOD!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, as with all products, but I am impressed. This little girl blew up a 3 compartment 8’x8’ float in 22 minutes flat. Impressive! I just put in to buying another. She blew harder, faster, stronger and was more reliable than my girlfriend that my wife allows me to have. If there was a way to trade her in for the side-piece I would, because the pump is a lot cheaper. Seriously this is something everyone with an inflatable should purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Swiggles McDurffy

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for vacuum storage bags
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pump to use for vacuum storage bags. I periodically have to use extra bedding for guests which I keep in vacuum storage bags while not in use. I thought that this pump would be useful for removing air from vacuum bags for storage, rather than using my large vacuum cleaner. I tried it on one vacuum bag. It took forever to remove the air and then not as completely as my vacuum cleaner. I have not tried blowing up any mattresses, so cannot comment on the pumps ability to do this. As an extraction pump, it is very disappointing and a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Beverley H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Pump!
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the Thermarest pump, there is absolutely no comparison. Buy this pump, you will not regret it. Fills my Big Agnes 25x78 mattress pad in about 20 seconds flat. Then does the same to vacuum it out! The volume of airflow is SIGNIFICANTLY greater than other small battery-operated pumps I have tried. The battery life is also significant, and having it be rechargeable is a real plus. I purchased the waterproof version which is great, but friend owns the regular Max version and is very happy with that as well. If you are looking for a battery-operated pump that actually works, this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan A. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: I liked it while it worked! It broke in 3 months :(
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Used one time and broke.
customer_reviews.text: Only charged and used it one time, it can no longer able to charge again.
customer_reviews.author: Triple H

customer_reviews.title: Lacking in power and attachments
customer_reviews.text: This item is a great idea but did not work for what I needed it. I wanted this to blow up tubes for the river but the attachments that came with it were not convenient to use for most Boston valves and it didn't give out enough air to blow something up quickly. If they made this slightly large her with the water resistance still I would love it but as it is now it's more convenient to use a battery operated pump.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and convenient
customer_reviews.text: For something approximately the size of a container of Ice Breakers gum, I was able to inflate this raft in 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie from Colorado

customer_reviews.title: 3 strikes
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but I am a little disappointed more so with amazon as well as the product. It worked great for 3 uses and now will no longer turn on. We purchased it on 6/23 and because it is 7/27 amazon will not take it back or exchange it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: P. Squillace

customer_reviews.title: Compact and inflates the item quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and comes with a little pouch to put pump and all attachments in. Have used it to add that extra bit of air to my self-inflating Sea to Summit Luxury Delta V Seat, my Luci solar power lantern and top up my Thermarest Luxury V2 Mat. Exactly what I was looking for. Came charged up. So far so good. Very happy with this little device.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Very Light and Small!
customer_reviews.text: This pumps up my BAM - Big Air Mattress (single full size coleman) when camping. It is so light weight - I cannot believe how well it performs. It pumped up my air mattress 3 nights without needing a USB Charge. Works great. It might not give you a very full tight air mattress but it works for me at 250lbs! Love this pump!
customer_reviews.author: W.K.K

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I used this for inflating a larger wedge to recline on. I was impressed with it big power for a small air pump. It does come with adapters however, it doesn’t have an adapter that fits my inflatable. Luckily, I was able to use my hand to seal off the excess air from escaping. It worked for me but I wish there was an adapter that would fit my wedge.
customer_reviews.author: powerchick11

customer_reviews.title: IMPRESSIVE!
customer_reviews.text: Nice powerful little pump. So compact and powerful. Use this for bringing the tow tube on the boat. I don't have to pre-inflate it and try to transport the massive thing. This would work well for most any low pressure inflating need - rafts, tubes, beds, etc...I sure hope this little beast holds up b/c it works like a champ!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Inflates fast, but loud
customer_reviews.text: Inflates my sleep pads and pillows well and fast. Not sure how long the charge lasts yet. When I first turned this on, it scared me due to being so loud. LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee L.

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The attachments don’t fit perfectly, but that little box is pretty darn amazing. It aired up and deflated our mattress 3 times on a single charge. It’s totally worth the money. Only down side is its considerably loud.
customer_reviews.author: Davin Purtle

customer_reviews.title: Decent pump so far.
customer_reviews.text: Pumps twin air mattress in 5 min but the adapter listed as fitting an air mattress does not fit. Had to make another adapter the unit came with work.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great for general floats
customer_reviews.text: Great for airing up general floats but not strong enough to air up an inflatable kayak.
customer_reviews.author: Tell me more

customer_reviews.title: You can’t go wrong purchasing this small pump
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son that had been renting a lot and he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Emery

customer_reviews.title: The pump does the job You need manually inflate a bit if pressure is needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a back up pump for camping
customer_reviews.author: Vadim T.

customer_reviews.title: Its for small blow jobs
customer_reviews.text: It is great as long as it's something little like a ball. Not a flamingo raft
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Small and Tons of Air!
customer_reviews.text: Just blew up a couple air mattresses with this little gem. Wasn't expecting much but it puts out may more air than it looks like it should and more than you need given it's size and battery. Impressed so far!
customer_reviews.author: John M. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Can't inflate or deflate a sleeping pad.
customer_reviews.text: Could not inflate or deflate my sleeping pad, or an inflatable kayak. It would be one thing if it couldn't inflate the kayak but a simple sleeping pad? They advertise the item with an image of a rubber boat, a yoga ball, an air sofa, an air bed but there is no way this thing will ever inflate any of those items.
customer_reviews.author: KF

product_meta.title: FLEXTAILGEAR - MAX Pump Plus Portable Air Pump with 3600mAh Battery USB Rechargeable Lightest Air Pump to Quick Inflate Deflate for Pool Floats Air Bed Air Mattress Swimming Ring (White)
feature_bullets: Built in Lithium Battery & USB Rechargeable: Built in 3600mAh lithium battery. The Air Pump can quickly recharge by power bank when outdoor or charge directly by phone charger at home.
Auto Inflate and Deflate: Insert the nozzle into air valve tightly and press the switch. Deflate function can quick deflate to save your time. Waterproof degree: IPX4.
Use Easily and Super Light: Dimensions 3" x 2", Weighs only 4.7 ounces. Lightweight and easy to use, is the best air pump for children. Widely used for beach, camping and outdoor parties.

Extensive Applicability: The Air Pump is equipped with four nozzles, suitable for most air mattresses, inflatable beds, pool floats, swimming rings, inflatable furniture, inflatable pools and other inflatable toys.
FLEXTAILGAIR have been committed to providing customers with the best products and services. If you are dissatisfied in any way, contact us to return it for replacement or 100% refund.
